content.text: In Python, we can perform operations with both numbers and text (strings). This learning unit will teach you how to use the most important operators for mathematical calculations and basic text manipulation.
Python supports the most common numeric operators:

a = 10
b = 3

print(a + b)   # 13
print(a - b)    # 7
print(a * b)    # 30
print(a / b)    # 3.333...
print(a // b)    # 3 -> integer division
print(a % b)    # 1 -> remainder
print(a ** b)    # 1000 -> 10^3
